page.title: 08VILLAGE SCHOOL
page.content:
{ Belbroughton C.E. First School
caters for village children aged 5 to 9 years. At present there are 39 children in school, in two classes according to age. The children study{mathematics, {language, sciences, environmental {science, history, music, physical {activities including swimming and {religious education as well as {cooking, gardening sewing etc. The school is sited in a large building, part of which is over a hundred years old and part of which is twenty years old. A nursery bed of trees has been established. There are both conifers and deciduous trees. When the saplings are strong enough it is hoped to plant them out to make a{small copse}within the extensive school grounds.
